website_summaries.verdict: If Goldilocks wore boots, she would buy these. Not too short. Not too tall. Effortlessly complement jeans, skirts, and dresses.
pros: Comes in black, brindle and rye
Man-made lining, cushioned non-removable insole.Stacked leather heel.Man-made sole
cons: Zipper is hard to open and close

customer_reviews.title: just like I thought they would
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! These are so hip! I loooooove them! Buttery soft and supple, stretch at the ankle, just like I thought they would. Only complaint is they make your feet look super long with that toe. Oh well, with the right outfit, it elongates the leg. These make me feel like I belong in SoHo. Cute, stylish and polished.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hiemstra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Hugs the ankle area just right and has that perfect "worn leather" feel so they're super comfy around the food and move easily. The only downside is that the bottoms are a bit hard so wearing these for long periods is not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a great everyday boot.
customer_reviews.text: Love that a size 10 actually fits a size 10. Good quality leather for the price I paid, which is lower than it may be now. Perfect height and a great walking everyday boot. The only reason this isn't five stars is because the opening of the book is a little wide. It would look better if it were tighter around the leg.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the soft leather. The bulky heel and height are perfect. Very comfortable. I bought brindle and it goes with anything. However because it's soft leather, it scratches easily and can be seen. I am sure the rye and black doesn't have this problem because they are darker colors. Otherwise, I am happy with my purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pair, great deal
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on at DSW and they didn't have my size. I went on Amazon and it was slightly cheaper. Came exactly as expected. I get SO many compliments wearing this pair of boots. Heel isn't too high. Great fall/winter pair of nice stylish boots. It's not shiny. Looks great with casual and semi-dressy outfits. I wore this also for my holiday photoshoot. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ORclimber

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit too small for me in the toe area. I recommend ordering at least a half size up or whole size if you plan on wearing thick socks. Very pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I have a high arch and have difficulty finding comfortable booties/shoes. These are so comfortable and cute too
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and have difficulty finding comfortable booties/shoes. These are so comfortable and cute too! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Guerreiro

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is great. The leather is buttery soft and the heel is a great height. When a boot has a back zip, I tend to buy a 1/2 size up, but I decided to buy my normal size and it fit perfect. These boots are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LisaCLisa

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the boots. Function of zipper on the back of the boots is not ideal. Hard to zip/unzip. Wish they were side zipping boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Payne

customer_reviews.title: Choose proper size..
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the spootty discoloration in the leather on the boots..blotchy...
customer_reviews.author: Delores banks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and are really stylish! I like the heal height. It's perfect for a daily walker.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable soft leather great quality I usually wear a size ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable soft leather great quality I usually wear a size 8 but after reading reviews I went with a 1/2 size bigger to 8.5 and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Marie Franco-Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots and they go with everything. Super comfortable to wear all day long
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Brought a 9M but and 8.5 fits better, brought a 2nd pair they feel SO good
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Oby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable! I love the zipper in the back. Best price anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: These are the MOST comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these boots, very easy to dress up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Ramone

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I have
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. My first Lucky boots and for sure not the last one. Many more to come.... 😀
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep G

customer_reviews.title: good boots.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 size, and the size came up perfectly. Comfortable and good quality. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nilyu

product_meta.title: Lucky Brand Women's Magine Ankle Boot
product_meta.description:
Ankle bootie

Rooted in rock 'n' roll with a signature sense of humor, Lucky Brand stands for independent thinking, individual style and a feeling as authentic as love. Friends since youth, creators Gene Montesano and Barry Perlman shipped the first order of Lucky Brand in 1990, and have been renowned for their great-fitting jeans and vintage-inspired apparel and accessories ever since.
